Reviews.Content: Great Rooms - Very Close to Streetcar - Outside of Frankfurt The hotel rooms were very large and the beds super comfortable! The breakfast was the best European breakfast I've ever had as far as variety and quality.Although the hotel is located outside of Frankfurt - it is literally across the street from a trolly stop which will take you directly to the main train station - way more convienient than the directions posted on the website.The down-side. We stayed in three different rooms for two nights. The first night, Saturday, my sister was kept up by a loud party directly underneath her room. She called the desk at least fur times between midnight and four am and they failed to handle the noise - no sleep for my sister. The next day at about 11am we were celebrating my Neice's birthday and the kids (3 of them) got a bit noisy when they were throwing streamers and chasing each other around. Security showed up and asked us to be quiet. We thought this was quite ironic.
Reviews.Author: mandlintx

Reviews.Content: Quite average Very convenient for the Industrial Park.The room was very clean  comfortable, fruit was a nice extra.Wasn't impressed with the standard of the breakfast especially at that price. Bar prices are expensive too. We went out for dinner. Reception staff very efficient but I didn't like the fact that one of them answered the phone whist supposed to be dealing we me.
Reviews.Author: TomJoyceEssex

Reviews.Content: Good Basic hotel, but far from city centre       View from Window
Reviews.Author: dum_chick_dum_dum

Reviews.Content: Perfect hotel for visits to Sanofi-Aventis Have stayed here several times over a number of years most recently in June this year.The hotel isn't in the centre Frankfurt but it is very close to the Hoechst site of Sanofi-Aventis.There aren't many restaurants close to the hotel but luckily the bar and restaurant of the hotel both offer good food.
Reviews.Author: huw2006

Reviews.Content: Okay hotel, not close to the Messe! Ok, maybe I did not look good enough, but when I booked this hotel I thought it would be close to the Congress Center (Messe), but this isn't the case! The hotel is outside the city center, but can be reached easily by streetcars. Takes about 20-25 minutes. The rooms are large and convenient. Breakfast is absolutely good! Staff is friendly.
Reviews.Author: AmsterdamSquirrel

Reviews.Content: Groaning Hotel Overall, this was accurately rated as a 3-star. The hotel was clean, comfortable, up-to-date, with friendly multi-lingual staff and well-appointed rooms. The food at the restaurant/bar was particularly tasty - which is a plus since there aren't a lot of other options in the area. A couple of cautions: 1)If you're looking for a cool location in Frankfurt, this isn't it. We had trouble even finding the place with the directions posted on the site. It's off in the suburbs - and it's a bit sketchy after dark. 2) The hotel is very noisy. Inside your room you can hear a horrible groaning (of the elevators, I think?), loud enough to interfere with my sleep even with earplugs. It quiets down in the wee hours, but starts up again around 5 a.m. This racket was bad enough for me to consider to switching hotels after the first night. It was like the place was possessed...However, the hotel is popular with flight attendants and pilots, so it must be a favorite in terms of price and convenience.
Reviews.Author: follette1976

Reviews.Content: in total okay We have also won an ebay auction. 2 nights in a double incl. breakfast, 2 days transport, one Hessisch platter for dinner and a welcome present for 40 Euros in total ;-) The first room we got was noisy caused by the elevator therefore we asked for a change. The second room was very spacious, well equipped (TV, radio, CD player, some magazines, small refrigator, desk). Breakfast was great ! The spa is a sauna, steam bath, some fitness equipments, chairs, which is okay. Sometimes the staff is a little unfriendly. Parking is 14 Euros/day which is expensive.In total: great deal for us !
Reviews.Author: kroeni

Reviews.Content: Budget Hotel We won 2 nights at Ebay for ca. 70 $, breakfast included, which was very good(eggs made by order) and a public transport ticket for two days, worth 14 Euro. The Hotel could need renovation, the room is okay, the bathroom is of the smallish side, but for the budget minded traveller it is a fair choice. The staff is friendly.
Reviews.Author: mathildexl

Reviews.Content: Run down place that sould be renovated. The Lindner in Frankfurt H枚chst might have been a comfortable place. But these times are gone. The place is run down and the beds are in terrible condition. Also the neighbouthood is not pleasant. It is in a suburban place out of town. To sum it up: It is really not worth the money!
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
